file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-01-04-04 - REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install Rear Electronic-Compartment Floor Panels. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ALL 53-01-04-000-801-A FLOOR PANELS - REMOVAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ALL 53-01-04-400-801-A FLOOR PANELS - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-01-04 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-01-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PANELS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove Rear Electronic-Compartment Floor Panels. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To tighten the screws available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Protective Gloves For protection of technician's hands 1 available Commercially Safety Goggles For protection of technician's eyes 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) TT-I-735 Isopropyl alcohol AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the rear electronic-compartment door (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-01-04 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1) that attach the floor panel (2) to the rear electronic- compartment floor beams. (2) Remove the floor panel (2). WARNING: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE SOLVENTS BECAUSE THEY ARE A HEALTH AND FIRE HAZARD. USE SAFETY GOGGLES AND PROTECTIVE CLOTHING WHEN YOU HANDLE THEM. DO NOT BREATHE THEIR GASES AND WORK IN A WELL VENTILATED AREA. (3) With a clean cloth soaked in Isopropyl alcohol, clean all floor panels where the work will be done. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-01-04 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Rear Electronic-Compartment Floor Panels - Installation Figure 401 B A ZONES 271 272 1. SCREW 1 DET. A 2 2. FLOOR PANEL DET. C C DET. B 1 TORQUE: 1.8 - 2.9 N.m (16 - 26 lb.in) 2 THE SCREWS MUST BE WET WITH COR-BAN 27L. EM145AMM530011B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-01-04 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-01-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PANELS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Rear Electronic-Compartment Floor Panels. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - IPC 53-01-01 COCKPIT FLOOR C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To tighten the screws available Commercially Acrylic spatula To install polyurethane film available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Protective Gloves For protection of technician's hands 1 available Commercially Safety Goggles For protection of technician's eyes 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MEP 09-075 Corrosion-Inhibiting Compound (COR-BAN 27L) AR TT-I-735 Isopropyl alcohol AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Floor Panel IPC 53-01-01 AR EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-01-04 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the rear electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the floor panel (2). WARNING: COR-BAN 27L IS TOXIC TO SKIN, EYES, AND RESPIRATORY TRACT. USE PVC GLOVES AND EYE PROTECTION. USE ONLY IN WELL VENTILATED AREAS. OBEY THE MANUFACTURER’S HEALTH AND SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS. (2) Install the screws (1) that attach the floor panel (2) to the rear electronic compartment floor beams. The screws must be wet with COR-BAN 27L. (3) Tighten the screws (1). NOTE: Apply torque of 1.8 - 2.9 N.m (16 - 26 lbf.in). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the rear electronic-compartment door (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-01-04 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
